rendering.macro.swagger.description=Enables you to display OpenAPI specifications directly in your wiki. rendering.macro.swagger.name=Swagger rendering.macro.swagger.parameter.defaultModelRendering.description=Example JSON (example), JSON schema (model) rendering.macro.swagger.parameter.defaultModelRendering.name=Show model as rendering.macro.swagger.parameter.displayOperationId.description=Show the ID of operations rendering.macro.swagger.parameter.displayOperationId.name=Display Operation ID rendering.macro.swagger.parameter.displayRequestDuration.description=Show the duration of Try it out requests rendering.macro.swagger.parameter.displayRequestDuration.name=Show request duration rendering.macro.swagger.parameter.filter.description=Show only this tag rendering.macro.swagger.parameter.filter.name=Filter rendering.macro.swagger.parameter.maxDisplayedTags.description=Show at most this many tags rendering.macro.swagger.parameter.maxDisplayedTags.name=Limit number of tags displayed rendering.macro.swagger.parameter.operationsSorter.description=Definition order (default), path (alpha), HTTP method (method) rendering.macro.swagger.parameter.operationsSorter.name=Methods sorter rendering.macro.swagger.parameter.password.description=Optional credentials for accessing the above URL rendering.macro.swagger.parameter.password.name=Password rendering.macro.swagger.parameter.proxy.description=Move the requst to retrive the OpenAPI specification from frontend to the backend to avoid CORS issues. rendering.macro.swagger.parameter.proxy.name=Cors Proxy rendering.macro.swagger.parameter.showCommonExtensions.description=Show extensions (pattern, maxLength, minLength, maximum, minimum) fields and values for Parameters rendering.macro.swagger.parameter.showCommonExtensions.name=Show common extensions rendering.macro.swagger.parameter.showExtensions.description=Show x- fields and values for Operations/Parameters/Schema rendering.macro.swagger.parameter.showExtensions.name=Show vendor extensions rendering.macro.swagger.parameter.supportedSubmitMethods.description=List the operations allowed in 'Try it out', separated by commas: get, post, put, delete, head, options, patch, trace. To disable 'Try it out' completely, enter none rendering.macro.swagger.parameter.supportedSubmitMethods.name=Supported submit methods rendering.macro.swagger.parameter.tagsSorter.description=Definition order (default), name (alpha) rendering.macro.swagger.parameter.tagsSorter.name=Tags Sorter rendering.macro.swagger.parameter.token.description=Optional access token for the above URL rendering.macro.swagger.parameter.token.name=Access token rendering.macro.swagger.parameter.url.description=Use the JSON API definition at this location rendering.macro.swagger.parameter.url.name=URL rendering.macro.swagger.parameter.userName.description= rendering.macro.swagger.parameter.userName.name=Username rendering.macro.swagger.parameter.validatorUrl.description=Validator used to validate the API definition. To disable validation, leave it blank rendering.macro.swagger.parameter.validatorUrl.name=Online API validator swagger.notifications.invalid=Failed to parse your OpenAPI specification.
